title: You've  been disconnected from chat....you may manually reconnect
body: I don't know why, but this has been happening every 5 minutes or so. Can't get invited into groups, cant chat to friends. No matter how many times I hit the reconnect button it just keeps on going. Also it seems the waiting for stats screen is doing its usual taking 5 minutes to clear. Can't even que a game until its over.

replies.body:
We're aware of the issue you are seeing, and looking into them.

Regarding connection to chat - the issue should only affect you when logging in or sometimes disconnecting from chat.   The best option is to relog and/or hit the chat reconnect button.  There's no ETA on a fix at this stage, but we are treating this with high priority.

Regarding waiting for stats, that is a separate issue, but we are also aware of it and working on a fix.

-Mindstar
